typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Dataset as string,
		IsFromTD as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TablesTable
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		BoxId as integer,
		ScriptName as string,
		QueryName as string,
		IsTDExtraction as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> JobsTable
source(output(
		box as string,
		jobs__name as string,
		jobs__script as string,
		jobs__query as string,
		jobs__table__name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BoxJobMap
source(output(
		FilePath as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		DatasetTableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TableFromQuery
TableFromQuery aggregate(groupBy(FilePath,
		DatasetTableName),
	LineNumber = first(LineNumber)) ~> DistinctTFQ
DistinctTFQ derive(QueryName = split(FilePath, '/')[6],
		Dataset = split(DatasetTableName, '.')[1],
		TableName = split(DatasetTableName, '.')[2]) ~> SplitTFQ
SplitTFQ, JobsTable join(SplitTFQ@QueryName == JobsTable@QueryName,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinGetJobID
JoinGetJobID, TablesTable join(SplitTFQ@Dataset == TablesTable@Dataset
	&& TableName == TablesTable@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinGetTableID
JoinGetTableID select(mapColumn(
		JobID = JobsTable@ID,
		TableID = TablesTable@ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIDs1
BoxJobMap, JobsTable join(jobs__name == Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinGetJobID2
JoinGetJobID2, TablesTable join(jobs__table__name == TablesTable@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinGetTableID2
JoinGetTableID2 select(mapColumn(
		JobID = JobsTable@ID,
		TableID = TablesTable@ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIDs2
SelectIDs1, SelectIDs2 union(byName: true)~> CombineData
CombineData sink(input(
		JobID as integer,
		TableID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkTablesInJobs
